name: Statistical Rethinking (2nd ed.) Assignments
body:
## Welcome to the solution to the assignments by Deportivo Bayesiano

We are a group of scientists from Buenos Aires Argentina who are interested on Statistical Modelling for the behavioural sciences.

This work was done mainly doing Covid's 19 social isolation.

You can visit the dolutions for [Chapter 2](https://spiousas.github.io/StatisticalRethinking_2ed_Assignments/Chapter_2.html) so far. .
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
